Package server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CallbackToServer
    interface used for updating gui must be overridden in implemented class
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AGame
    class that holds player object with its opponent player.
    AllConnected  
    Available
    class that stores the available to play clients in a hashmap.Singleton class.
    ClientHandler
    class that handles the clients and their messages, sends them to the correct user.
    Controller
    Connects the ServerUI and the Log it also inherits Observable to be able to tell the server someone is to be disconnected by force
    Log
    A log class that adds text to the log and returns log as string
    Player
    class that is a player with username and clienthandler
    Server
    class that creates the serversocket and listens for connecting clients and starts new thread for each client
    ServerUI
    GUI for server with logging and info displaying capabilities
    StartUp  
    UIConnected
